What's Changed
####################

Summary
---------------------

Summary of changes in the Alias Python API version |version|.

Bug Fixes
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

* ``AlMessageType.LayersReordered`` message is now handled correctly.


Removed members
================

* ``AlStoreOptions._iges_atf.store_want_layer``
* ``AlStoreOptions._iges_atf.store_want_group_brep``
* ``AlStoreOptions._iges_atf.store_want_group_hierarchy``
* ``AlStoreOptions._iges_atf.store_want_curve_asm_conversion``
* ``AlRetrieveOptions._iges_atf.retrieve_want_parametric``
* ``AlRetrieveOptions._iges_atf.retrieve_want_construction``
* ``AlRetrieveOptions._iges_atf.retrieve_want_nested_group``
* ``AlRetrieveOptions._iges_atf.retrieve_want_curve_as_wire``
* ``AlRetrieveOptions._iges_atf.retrieve_want_unbounded_plane_as_wp``
* ``AlRetrieveOptions._iges_atf.retrieve_want_transformation_as_wp``
* ``AlRetrieveOptions._iges_atf.retrieve_want_scan_data``
